text: John E. O'Brien (October 22, 1851 – December 31, 1914) was a professional baseball player who played outfielder in the Major Leagues in 1884 for the Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association. He later played for the Bridgeport Giants of the Eastern League in 1885. ==External links== Category:1851 births Category:1914 deaths Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Baltimore Monumentals players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Bridgeport Giants players Category:Baseball players from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Ohio
title: John O'Brien (outfielder)
